# WET Labs ECO Puck FLBBCD

## Overview

The ECO Puck FLBBCD is a three-parameter fluorometer designed to measure chlorophyll-a, CDOM (Colored Dissolved Organic Matter), and optical backscatter.

## Key Features

- **Manufacturer**: Sea-Bird Scientific (WET Labs)
- **Model**: ECO Puck FLBBCD
- **Type**: Fluorometer
- **Deployment**: Integrated with CTD at 0.6m depth

## Measured Variables

- Chlorophyll-a concentration (CHLOR_WETLABS)

## Specifications

| Parameter | Range | Resolution |
|-----------|-------|------------|
| Chlorophyll-a | 0.03 to 75 µg/L | 0.01 µg/L |

## Links

- [Manufacturer Product Page](https://www.seabird.com/eco-puck-series/product?id=60762467726)
- [Sea-Bird Scientific](https://www.seabird.com/)

## Deployment Notes

This fluorometer is typically integrated with the SBE 37 CTD system on Saildrone vehicles. Data is averaged over 10-minute intervals.
